author: protolambda
content:
Prototype here: https://github.com/protolambda/eth2-api-testgen
Idea is that you write tiny generator functions that yield some URL/inputs/status data, which then get organized and executed against a real eth2 beacon node.

author: protolambda
content: Client implementers could use it to hit every v1 API endpoint as test. With some more scripting, you could compare the outputs.

author: protolambda
content: And I'll use the outputs as test vectors for the API bindings I'm working on
